adrFormatAddress: 53 W 104th St, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: I have worked with the LOMI girls twice now and both times I have had the best time! Not only are they super talented and hardworking, but they are also reliable and always give their 100% at every shoot. The photos they took came out great and have gotten great feedback on them. I am excited to work more with the LOMI company.

text.text: I have worked with the LOMI girls twice now and both times I have had the best time! Not only are they super talented and hardworking, but they are also reliable and always give their 100% at every shoot. The photos they took came out great and have gotten great feedback on them. I am excited to work more with the LOMI company.

originalText.text:
This team is so professional and fun and fantastic and will make your photo session a memorable one. They are both extremely talented and make you feel special and at ease. The environment is extremely conscious of being safe with air purifiers and temperature taking and screening before hand so that everyone can feel safe and secure. Photo shoots are also done at various locations depending on the mood that they want to create.
Your make up will be done according to the look that you want to portray. They are both extremely creative and talented. I personally hate being in front of a camera and always feel very awkward but that was not the case when I worked with these two women, as they made me feel so relaxed and created a space where I felt safe too come out of my shell and really got some amazing shots! Don’t hesitate getting photos taken here no matter what the theme they will accommodate, whether it be for professional purposes or just for your own personal use, they will do a stupendous job.

originalText.text: This is a full-service studio: hair, makeup, styling, and amazing and artful photography.  Both of the ladies are absolutely delightful to work with and take their time with you to help you get your best take. Super professional.

text.text: This is a full-service studio: hair, makeup, styling, and amazing and artful photography.  Both of the ladies are absolutely delightful to work with and take their time with you to help you get your best take. Super professional.

originalText.text: Amazing to work with and photo quality was incredible. Kept the shoot fun and relaxed while also accomplishing all of the shots I wanted to get during my time there. Would recommend 10/10
